name: sap-cloud-identity-directory-service
label: SAP Cloud Identity Directory Service
description: The identity directory provides a System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) 2.0 REST API for managing resources (users, groups and custom schemas). Consumers of this REST API should be familiar with System for Cross-domain Identity Management Protocol before managing their own resources.

fields.title: Tenant ID
fields.name: tenantID
fields.tooltip: Specify Tenant ID of the SAP Environment
fields.description: Specify the tenant ID of the SAP Environment.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: clientID
fields.tooltip: Specify the Client ID of System Identity Key configured in the SAP Environment.
fields.description: Specify the Client ID of the System Identity Key configured in the SAP Environment.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: clientSecret
fields.tooltip: Specify the Client Secret of the System Identity Key configured in the SAP Environment.
fields.description: Specify the Client Secret of the System Identity Key configured in the SAP Environment.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get User List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users based on input parameters specified.

parameters.title: User UUID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the UUID of the user to retrieve its details.
parameters.description: Specify the UUID of the user to retrieve its details. e.g. 313b0556-8810-48ee-a335-b666d1b786ff

parameters.title: Username
parameters.name: userName
parameters.tooltip: Specify the user name of user to retrieve the details.
parameters.description: Specify the user name of user to retrieve the details. e.g. John

parameters.title: User Type
parameters.name: userType
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of users which you want to retrieve.
parameters.description: Specify the type of users which you want to retrieve. You can choose from following: "Customer", "Employee", "Partner", "Public", "External", "Onboardee"

parameters.title: Filter Query
parameters.name: filter
parameters.placeholder: Example: emails.value eq "user@example.com" and displayName eq "John"
parameters.tooltip: Specify the query based on which you want to retrieve the users.
parameters.description:
Specify the query based on which you want to retrieve the users. Example: emails.value eq "user@example.com" and displayName eq "John".
For more details visit: https://api.sap.com/api/IdDS_SCIM/path/getUsers

parameters.title: Start ID
parameters.name: start_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start ID of the user which is returned as the first entry of the query result. Note: if this parameter is not provided then you will not get the "nextId" in response to fetch remaining pages.
parameters.description: Specify the start ID of the user which is returned as the first entry of the query result. By default it is set to initial which will retrieve the first page. Note: if this parameter is not provided then you will not get the "nextId" in response to fetch remaining pages.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of items to be returned per page. Maximum it will retrieve 100 results per page.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of items to be returned per page. A negative value is interpreted as 0, which means that no results should be returned. Anything above 100 will return only 100 results per page.

operations.title: Delete User
operations.description: Delete existing user from Identity directory based on User UUID.

parameters.title: User UUID
parameters.name: userUUID
parameters.description: Specify the UUID of user you want to delete from Identity Directory
parameters.tooltip: Specify the UUID of user you want to delete from Identity Directory

operations.title: Create User
operations.description: Creates a new user to the Identity directory.

parameters.title: Email Address
parameters.name: email
parameters.tooltip: Specify the email address of user to be created in Identity Directory
parameters.description: Specify the email address of user to be created in Identity Directory

parameters.title: Login Name
parameters.name: userName
parameters.tooltip: Specify the login name of user to be created in Identity Directory
parameters.description: Specify the login name of user to be created in Identity Directory

parameters.title: First Name
parameters.name: givenName
parameters.tooltip: Specify the first name of user to be created in Identity Directory.
parameters.description: Specify the first name of user to be created in Identity Directory.

parameters.title: Last Name
parameters.name: familyName
parameters.tooltip: Specify the last name of user to be created in Identity Directory
parameters.description: Specify the last name of user to be created in Identity Directory

parameters.title: User Type
parameters.name: userType
parameters.tooltip: select the user type.
parameters.description: select the user type. You can choose from following: "Customer", "Employee", "Partner", "Public", "External", "Onboardee". By default it is set as Public

parameters.title: User details
parameters.name: userDetails
parameters.tooltip: Specify the other details of user which you want to create in JSON format.

operations.title: Update User Details
operations.description: Updates user details based on input parameter specified.

parameters.title: User UUID
parameters.name: userUUID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Unique User ID (UUID) of the user whose details you want to update.
parameters.description: Specify the Unique User ID (UUID) of the user whose details you want to update.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select if you want to change the current status of user.
parameters.description: Select if you want to change the current status of user. You can choose from "Active" and "Inactive"

parameters.title: Operations
parameters.name: operations
parameters.tooltip: Select the operation you want to do on the attribute of the users.
parameters.description: Select the operation you want to do on the attribute of the users. You can choose from "Add Attribute", "Remove Attribute", "Replace Attribute".

Add Attribute.name: path

Remove Attribute.tooltip: Specify the the path of the user attribute which you want to remove.
Remove Attribute.description: Specify the the path of the user attribute which you want to remove.

Replace Attribute.title: Attribute Path

Replace Attribute.tooltip: Specify the the path of the user attribute which you want to replace.
Replace Attribute.description: Specify the the path of the user attribute which you want to replace.

Replace Attribute.title: New Value
Replace Attribute.name: value

parameters.title: Additional Operations
parameters.name: add_operations
parameters.tooltip: Specify additional operations in JSON format to perform on user attributes.

operations.title: Get Group List
operations.description: Retrieves list of groups from Identity Directory based on input parameters specified.

parameters.title: Display Name
parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: Specify the display name of Group to be retrieved from Identity Directory. e.g. Administrators
parameters.tooltip: Specify the display name of Group to be retrieved from Identity Directory.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: urn:sap:cloud:scim:schemas:extension:custom:2.0:Group:name
parameters.description: Specify the name of group which you want to retrieve from Identity Directory. e.g. test
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of group which you want to retrieve from Identity Directory.

parameters.title: Filter Query
parameters.name: filter
parameters.placeholder: e.g. externalId eq "admin_ext" and displayName eq "Administrators"
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filter query based on which you want to retrieve the groups.
parameters.description:
Specify the filter query based on which you want to retrieve the groups. e.g. externalId eq "admin_ext" and displayName eq "Administrators". 
For more details visit: https://api.sap.com/api/IdDS_SCIM/path/getGroups

parameters.title: Start ID
parameters.name: start_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start ID of the group which is returned as the first entry of the query result. Note: if this parameter is not provided then you will not get the "nextId" in response to fetch remaining pages.
parameters.description: Specify the start ID of the group which is returned as the first entry of the query result. By default it is set to initial which will retrieve the first page. Note: if this parameter is not provided then you will not get the "nextId" in response to fetch remaining pages.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of items to be returned per page. Maximum it will retrieve 100 results per page.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of items to be returned per page. A negative value is interpreted as 0, which means that no results should be returned. Anything above 100 will return only 100 results per page.

operations.title: Delete Group
operations.description: Deletes a group based on specified group ID from Identity Directory.

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Specify the group ID of the group which to be deleted from Identity Directory.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group ID of the group which to be deleted from Identity Directory.

operations.title: Create Group
operations.description: Creates a group in Identity Directory.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of group to be created in Identity Directory.
parameters.description: Specify the name of group to be created in Identity Directory. e.g. Administrators

parameters.title: Display Name
parameters.name: displayName
parameters.tooltip: Specify the display name of group to be created in Identity Directory.
parameters.description: Specify the display name of group to be created in Identity Directory. e.g. ExampleGroup

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of group to be created in Identity Directory.
parameters.description: Specify the description of group to be created in Identity Directory.

parameters.title: External ID
parameters.name: externalId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the external ID of group to be created in Identity Directory
parameters.description: Specify the external ID of group to be created in Identity Directory

parameters.title: Members
parameters.name: members
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated user IDs of of the users which you want to add to the User Group. e.g. user_id1, user_id2, user_id3
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated user IDs of of the users which you want to add to the User Group.

operations.title: Update Group Members
operations.description: Updates group members of existing group based on group ID and operation specified.

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.name: group_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group ID of the group whose members you want to update.
parameters.description: Specify the group ID of the group whose members you want to update.

parameters.title: Operation
parameters.name: operation
parameters.tooltip: Select the operation you want to do on the group.
parameters.description: Select the operation you want to do on the group. You can choose from Add Members, Remove Members and Replace Members

Add Members.title: User UUIDs
Add Members.name: user_uuids
Add Members.tooltip: Specify the Unique User IDs (UUID) of the user which should be added to the group. You can specify multiple comma separated user UUIDs.
Add Members.description: Specify the Unique User ID (UUID) of the user which should be added to the group. You can specify multiple comma separated user UUIDs. e.g. user_id1, user_id2, user_id3

Remove Members.title: User UUIDs
Remove Members.name: user_uuids
Remove Members.tooltip: The Unique User ID (UUID) of the user which should be removed from the group. You can specify multiple comma separated user UUIDs.
Remove Members.description: The Unique User ID (UUID) of the user which should be removed from the group. You can specify multiple comma separated user UUIDs. e.g. user_id1, user_id2, user_id3

Replace Members.title: Old User UUID
Replace Members.name: user_path
Replace Members.tooltip: Specify the user UUID of the user which you want to removed from the group. You can specify multiple comma separated user UUIDs.
Replace Members.description: Specify the user UUID of the user which you want to removed from the group. You can specify multiple comma separated user UUIDs. e.g. old_user_id1, old_user_id2, old_user_id3

Replace Members.title: New User UUIDs
Replace Members.name: user_uuids
Replace Members.tooltip: Specify the user UUIDs of the new users to be added in group.
Replace Members.description: Specify the user UUIDs of the new users to be added in group. e.g. new_user_id1, new_user_id2, new_user_id3
